problem_text_cn: 如图若把△ABC绕C顺时针旋转25°,得到△A’B’C,A’B’交AC于D.己知∠A’DC=90,则∠A的度数为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, if we rotate △ABC clockwise around C by N_0, we get △A’B’C, A’B’ crosses AC to D. Knowing that ∠A’DC = N_1, then the degree of ∠A is ()
raw_comment: 本题主要考查了图形的旋转1旋转只改变图形的位置,不改变图形的形状是解答本题的关键.
